nodes.text: A standard month, also referred to simply as a month, was a period of time that spanned several standard weeks. On Coruscant, a year was made up of twelve months.[source?] Certain events were often held at set times of a month. On Cynda, the moon of the Inner Rim planet Gorse, blood cultists would appear once a month, during a full moon, for blood sacrifices. The Q'anah was held on the planet Asmeru once per year on the 234th day of the 16th month on the Asmeru calendar. On Batuu, a month was made up of 30 days.
